ovdesc.p: This table holds the generic mapping xsl (stylesheet) for mapping from one table to another.
This is a template with PGM.TYPE as "U"

desc.p: This field contains short description about the record it is holding. Will be used for enrichment purpose.
This is the @ID of this template.
TABLENAME is a valid T24 table. Can be one of one of ‘HULTWD’ PGM.TYPE’s
The suffix ‘UPDATE/DELETE’ depends upon the xsl this holds.

If the xsl (stylesheet) contains the mapping logic for the table update(input/edit) then the Id would the <Tablename>-UPDATE or if it contains the mapping logic for the a delete then the Id should be <TableName>-DELETE
Meaningful description of the record or the stylesheet.

This field can be expanded to allow the User to enter the Description of the record in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new Language as defined in the LANGUAGE table (Ref: GENERAL TABLES), and will indicate to the User the Language in which the Description must be entered.
TEXT box which stores the mapping stylesheet
